name: WagerOn
description: Start playing daily fantasy sports with crypto today, on Wager On! The ultimate platform for precision betting on individual player performances. Our token, $WAGER will have a direct correlation to revenue generated off our platform in the form of buyback and burns. A soon to be disclosed % from all revenue generated on WagerOn.io, will go directly into buying back and burning the token. We aren't selling you promises, a meme, or a bullshit roadmap. Our product is built, ready to go, and being updated every single day. We want to take over the sports betting sector in Web3 with our innovative model, and are excited to bring you guys along for the ride. At Wager On, we've reimagined the world of daily fantasy sports by combining cutting-edge blockchain technology with your passion for sports
